Evaluation.explanation: The candidate demonstrates good technical proficiency with Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Spring Boot, Next.js, ReactJS and SQL databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL). The projects listed provide evidence of hands-on experience with these technologies. The candidate has understanding of SDLC through project implementation. The courses listed also helps the candidate with more understanding of fundamental technologies.

The candidate showcases problem-solving skills through participation in competitive programming (UIT ACM/ICPC BootCamp, ICPC Vietnam National Programming Contest) and project implementation, especially in optimizing server load efficiency using debounce and caching with Redis. The description of security implementations in both projects also indicates the problem-solving skill of the candidate.

The CV highlights collaboration through group projects (FoodHub) and involvement in the WebDev Studio and UIT ACM/ICPC BootCamp. The candidate also attends multiple workshops and training sessions focused on the latest web development technologies and best practices, so it is possible that the candidate has communication skills.

The candidate demonstrates adaptability by using different tech stacks for different projects (OptiMart and FoodHub), indicating a willingness to learn and apply new technologies. The participation in workshops and training sessions suggests a proactive approach to learning. The use of new technologies such as Next.js 14 indicates the candidate's willing to explore new technologies.
